about_the_game:
Earth needs you. Well, it needs someone to fly their newest rocket to space and inspire the masses, and you’re next on the hiring list.

Journey from Earth to Pluto and beyond, building wild item synergies and combos to push your rocket to unimaginable speeds. Restock and hire crew to help out, and bring back glory to earth one boost at a time!

The engine of the future

Place fuel items into 18 slots on a novel and chaotic engine board. With 6 segments and 3 rings that will rotate randomly after each boost, stay on your toes to plan your synergies as best you can.

No such thing as a misfuel

With a planned 100+ items across 12+ fuel types, each with its own effects and bonuses, no two journeys will be the same.

Friends along the way

A planned 40+ crew members can be hired and upgraded after each phase of your journey, giving bonuses and increasing your chances of travelling to the edge of the solar system!

Strategy and fate

With an engine prone to reorganising itself and a limited stock from the acquisition counter after each boost, you’ll have to stay on your toes to build the strongest strategy you can against the odds.

Challenges and Rewards

Take it easier in cadet mode, manage an overheating engine in commander mode, or face an array of setbacks in specialist mode. Gain glory equal to your struggles, use it to buy crew and restock your engines, and push ever deeper into the vastness of space.
